vclaim: Former U.S. President Donald Trump offered rooms in Trump International Hotel in Washington, D.C., to members of the National Guard who had been relocated to a parking garage from the U.S. Capitol after Inauguration Day in January 2021.
title: RUMOR ALERT: Did Trump Give National Guard Permission To Stay in Trump International Hotel?
subtitle: More evidence is required before this claim can be rated in a traditional Snopes fact check.
author: Nur Ibrahim
